Text:
great to see Pilli Bebek here
thanks MarsVoltaic
can't believe my eyes! i wouldn't even think of pilli bebek could be found here. just tried my chance, searched for "pilli", then... ohh dude! awesome upload. will seed as much as i can.
I'm glad others out there like Pilli. I found out about them from my ex. But I'm a little surprised that no one I've ever met in Turkey has heard of them, even Turkish metalheads I've met.
